name: GRAVOUR (Gravity & Parkour)
description:
Hey! This is my first uploaded game that was developed during the 3rd Nokia 3310 Game Jam.  This game is about a little slime making his way through levels using zero-gravity most of the time.

The game is in development so I just compressed everything in a zip folder.

I will add support to other operating systems soon.

Instructions:

A&D for movement

Spacebar for jumping

Shift for anti-grav

R to Reload the current level if you get stuck

G to Restart the game
